pageContext.claim: “Despite all of the Fake News, my Poll Numbers are great. New internal polls show them to be the strongest we've had so far!”
pageContext.analysis: News reports said the internal polls were actually pretty poor. On Aug. 18, the blended poll rating at FiveThirtyEight shows Trump with an approval rating of 42.2 percent; the disapproval rating was 53.7 percent.
